In this article, I go through 7 tips to make performance reviews painless and fair for everybody involved.

posts.title: Fully integrate contractors into your team

As an Engineering leader, you are keen to reduce burnout risk and consider hiring a couple of contractors when the team needs to deliver a large project fast. But are you fully aware of the trade-offs?
